q: President Bush focused on a war with Iraq almost immediately after the Sept. 11, 2001 terror attacks. executive has been outspoken about job growth, "not in the United States but in China." The Senator notes in his statement that GE has been steadily moving its manufacturing plants overseas. I hope he changes his mind and focuses on rebuilding the manufacturing sector here in the United States, not in China, and in the process creates millions of good-paying jobs, the senator said. Sen. Bernie Sanders issued the statement after making a visit to an industrial community in Vermont's Connecticut River Valley. GE didn't return a call or an email asking for comment.

A number of leading politicians also expressed indignation, and ANSA news agency said talks were planned next week between Sergio Marchionne and Economic Development Minister Paolo Romani .
